fragment: Jimmy bribes Lance to lie for him when Ernesto brings Chuck to the store to question him.
Kim later starts a solo practice with Mesa Verde Bank as her only client.
Chuck apologizes for hiding his disability from Rebecca.
Mike provides cash and fake Canadian ID cards for Nacho and his father to flee Albuquerque.
Gus threatens Manuel's life to coerce Nacho into providing inside information.
Hector considers using Manuel's shop as a front for his drug trade.
Walt kidnaps Holly to punish Skyler for attempting to stab him.
Skyler confides in Pamela, her divorce attorney, about Walter being a drug dealer.
Jesse breaks down during a group therapy session, yelling at the group leader about accepting oneself for making mistakes.
Holly is seen learning to walk in season 5.
